name: Burnout Drift
description: Are you a drift master? Prove your skills in Burnout Drift!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista Processor: 2.66 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo E6700 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GeForce 8800 GT DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: Sound card compatible with DirectX® 9.0с Additional Notes: The application’s stability is not guaranteed on Intel HD Graphics and AMD HD Radeon on-board graphics cards.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 Processor: 3.5 GHz Intel i7 3770K Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GTX 1060 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Sound card compatible with DirectX® 9.0с Additional Notes: The application’s stability is not guaranteed on Intel HD Graphics and AMD HD Radeon on-board graphics cards.
